item.title: Creating a Continuous Improvement System
item.description: When we want to accomplish something or achieve a goal, sometimes we succeed, and sometimes we face challenges. Can we find a method that makes it easier to succeed? My answer is PDCA(plan–do–check–adjust). Just do it, let it fail if necessary, and then find a new way to fix it.
